model.docs:
**int**: Specify which rain sensor you have connected. Must be either `RG_9` or `RG_15`.

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

acc.docs:
Amount of rain since last message (see `update_interval`), in `mm`. Only on RG-15.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

event_acc.docs:
Amount of rain for this event (i.e. since it last stopped raining), in `mm`. Only on RG-15.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

total_acc.docs:
Total amount of rain this sensor has ever measured, in `mm`. Only on RG-15.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

r_int.docs:
Current rain intensity in `mm/h`. Only on RG-15.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

moisture.docs:
Rain intensity level from 0-7. Only on RG-9.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

hydreon_rgxx_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the Hydreon Rain Sensor display.

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*

too_cold.docs:
`true` if the sensor reports being too cold. Hydreon only mentions this feature for the RG-9.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the voltage sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).
  
  

*See also: [Hydreon Rain Sensor Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/hydreon_rgxx.html#configuration-variables)*
